config.anemos.gamma.min.desc: The minimum value of the gamma can be reached.
config.anemos.gamma.default_.desc: The default value of the gamma, will also be used for fallbacks caused by errors.
config.anemos.gamma.max.desc: The maximum value of the gamma can be reached.
config.anemos.gamma.sliderInterval.desc: How much the gamma value changes per slider step. Will only work with sodium!
config.anemos.gamma.transitionTime.desc: How longer the transition will be.
config.anemos.fnv.transitionTime.desc: How longer the transition will be.
config.anemos.fnv.fog.desc: Enables or disables the night vision fog for fake night vision.
config.anemos.rmb.transitionTime.desc: How longer the transition will be.
